data.expected_result: The image should be closed without crashing
data.short_description: App crashes after opening image preview in embed in the "Jump to Chat" page
data.steps_to_repro: - Post an image link that has an image preview in an embed (i.e Imgur) (This step is optional) - Go to the "Jump to Chat" page where the image in embed preview is seen (you can either use search or the pin messages) (Important: Use `in: <The channel that you're in>` in the search tab to make to make sure that the "Jump to Chat" screen is in the same channel as you are or you won't be able to open the image preview when you're on a different channel) - Tap on the image - Close the image by swiping it down
